game.name: Lab Remnants
game.desc:
Lab Remnants is a monochromatic roguelike full of secrets and challenges. Play as an artificially made creature and make your way through your own creators to escape from their crazy experiments.
Explore dungeons, labs, forests, and many other locations to collect as many coins and power-ups as you can.
Unlock new characters and upgrade them to defeat even the strongest of bosses.
